title: How to buy refurbished gadgets - Quora

response.answer_text: Buying a refurbished tech product will save you money compared to buying it new. It also gives a device a second life instead of sending it off to be recycled. On the other hand, buying something refurbished can be a gamble, despite the fact that the product is probably more affordable. It’s possible to both save money and not get swindled when buying refurbished products. Below, we’ve laid out some tips that you can follow as well as links to trustworthy retailers. None of this is fail-proof, but it will make the process a lot safer and you can end up with great devices at lower prices.
Most major retailers have them on their main web sites. Try searching things like refurbished laptop or refurbished samsung s10 etc
